document_data.caption: The Oghman temple of Songhal
document_data.name: House of Many Tomes
document_data.mainbody: The '''House of Many Tomes''' was one of the largest and most renowned temples of [[Oghma]] in all of [[Faer√ªn]], located in the town of [[Songhal]] in [[Impiltur]]. It was considered among the [[sage]]s of the Realms as a great place of learning, that brought significant prestige to its home town.{{Cite dragon/346/Impiltur: The Forgotten Kingdom}}
document_data.Description:
The main road leading up to the House of Many Tomes was surrounding by serene grasslands and well-manicured trees. The temple itself featured a number of columns, massive front doors and a massive stained-glass window that resembled Oghma's [[holy symbol]].Some descriptions based on the artist's rendering.

Just outside the entrance, beyond the central walkway, was a single-tiered amphitheater.
